Good Comments: I don't mind that it's a Viz Rip. It still has better video quality than HorribleSubs and definitely better translation than Commie's.. :|
Bad Comments: Viz rip. Really bad. A small wait for Asenshi to pair the same subs with a better encode is worth it. Especially for a show spending this much money on its visuals.
Standard coloring/font, easy to read, good grammar and use of punctuation

Good Comments: crisp, clean quality. proof read Funimation subs (as they claim). fine sub-group in my opinion. MUCH better on the eyes than horriblesubs.
Bad Comments: tolerable fast subs and at least they got the opening subbed

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.

Good Comments: People complaining about "Bitch"? There were worse errors in here. All in all, if there were no other choices, these subs are more than decent, but since there ARE other choices, I'd skip them~
Better choices which by comparison has become very apparent
Ugly font, didn't even include chapters in their subs.
ビッチ actually do mean bitch you can go and translate yourself if you want to.
Bad Comments: Terrible translation. 'Bicchi' in Japanese doesn't mean the same thing as 'bitch' in English, by the way.

ビッチ is more closer to slut than bitch. Which one looks better to you (example from the show): 
I'm not a bitch! I'm a virgin!
I'm not a slut! I'm a virgin!
They're the only ones subbing it.
